Title: In a first, juvenile to be tried as adult in gang-rape case
Content: In a first instance in rape cases, the Juvenile Justice Board here on Wednesday asked a child in conflict with law (CCL) to face trial as an adult for allegedly kidnapping and gang-raping a minor alo
Author: Special Correspondent
Description: In a first instance in rape cases, the Juvenile Justice Board here on Wednesday asked a child in conflict with law (CCL) to face trial as an adult for allegedly kidnapping and gang-raping a minor alo
